title: Daniil Medvedev Wins His First Big Tennis Match in a Long Time
summary: Daniil Medvedev is a tennis player from Russia who had not won a match at a big tournament called a Grand Slam for 370 days. He finally won his first match at the Australian Open, which is one of the biggest tennis tournaments. He beat Jesper de Jong from the Netherlands with a score of 7-5, 6-2, 7-6. Medvedev has been trying to be more positive on the court, and this win shows it is working. He had lost his first matches at other Grand Slams like the French Open, Wimbledon, and the US Open last year. Medvedev is happy and hopes to keep playing well. This win is important because it helps him feel confident again.
